beneficialOwners.title: Beneficial Owners
beneficialOwners.description: The list of the individuals with a beneficial ownership in this organization.

id.title: Person ID
id.description: A local ID for the person.

name.title: Person name
name.description: The full name of the person.

identifier.title: Person Identifier
identifier.description: The legal identifier for this person. Follow the guidance from the Beneficial Ownership Data Standard to set the identifier scheme with the pattern {JURISDICTION}-{TYPE} where JURISDICTION is an uppercase ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code and TYPE is one of PASSPORT, TAXID or IDCARD

nationality.title: Person nationality
nationality.description: The ISO 2-Digit country code representing the nationality held by this individual.
